ygData.subject: Is chain still buggered?
ygData.msgSnippet: A few nights ago I was hunting in Permafrost with a bunch of friends. However one of my friends is a level 17 rogue so we all decided to make some pulls to
ygData.messageBody:
A few nights ago I was hunting in Permafrost with a bunch of friends.
However one of my friends is a level 17 rogue so we all decided to make
some pulls to help him gain a level or so. As usual I ran in and made a
pull and drag some gobs out. To ensure that they were agro on me I played
a healthly mixture of Lullaby and chains if it attacked my rogue friend.
Now what I did notice was the fact that my chains never, not even once
held on a gob that was running away. An I am 100% sure that some of these
gobs did not have any chance for a SoW to be cast on them. SO I wanted to
ask if anyone else has had a similar problem.

Treilanin Loreweaver
